name: Brainyloft
tagline: An immersive mobile marketing creative agency.
description:
Brainyloft is an immersive mobile marketing creative agency, that works with brands to make the world a better place through social impact and sustainability. We push the limits of creativity and innovation by leveraging data using Human Assisted Artificial Intelligence (HAAI), machine learning and automation to grow audiences, increase sales, build powerful sources of insight and deliver an impressive ROI.
 
We help our brands achieve better results by using mobile based solutions, programmatic advertising and emerging technologies like Mobile Game Development and Mobile Virtual Reality. We are extremely selective about the brands we partner with. This allows us to maintain the highest level of quality and performance.
 
In a world where brands must quickly adapt to this constantly shifting marketing and technology landscape, it’s imperative to have a mobile marketing creative agency who is one step ahead. With data science at our core, we know your brand isn’t defined by just a mobile ad, landing page or a website.
